about_the_game:
Welcome to The War Machine, an inventive expansion for Age of Fear 5: The Day of the Rat! This crafty quest can be played at any time during the main campaign.

Follow the story of a down-on-his-luck Dwarf Engineer and the greatest creation of his life - a construct of awe-inspiring power! However, he cannot build it alone...

Will you help bring this fearsome weapon of war from dream to reality?

FEATURE LIST


⭐ A HUNT FOR RARE MATERIALS that spans the realm!

⭐ UNPREDICTABLE ACTION and an invention that may be more than meets the eye!

⭐ A POWERFUL CONSTRUCT to join your army!
